title: june 15: blood transfusion
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the history of blood transfusion. After, she reflects on Tessa Violet’s “Crush.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
